title: PHP - Traduccion de los menu items en /mi-cuenta
description: Script para traducir los items del menu si se usa el widget Mi Cuenta de Elementor PRO. Sino sale en ingles.

title: Espera a la inicializacion del Swiper
JS Snippet 9
code: const cube = n => n * n * n;

title: JS Snippet 10
code: const factorial = n => n <= 1 ? 1 : n * factorial(n - 1);

title: JS Snippet 11
code: const fib = n => n <= 1 ? n : fib(n - 1) + fib(n - 2);

title: JS Snippet 13
code: const wait = ms => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));

title: JS Snippet 14
code: const getRandom = (min, max) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;

title: JS Snippet 18
code: const pick = (obj, keys) => keys.reduce((a, e) => (a[e] = obj[e], a), {});

title: JS Snippet 19
code: const omit = (obj, keys) => Object.keys(obj).filter(k => !keys.includes(k)).reduce((a, e) => (a[e] = obj[e], a), {});
